Services.title: Our Services
Services.subtitle: Complete expertise for all your financing needs.

realEstate.title: Mortgage
realEstate.description: Negotiation of the best rates for your primary, secondary, or rental residence.

insurance.title: Loan Insurance
insurance.description: Save up to 50% on your loan insurance with the same guarantees.

creditConsolidation.title: Debt Consolidation
creditConsolidation.description: Consolidate your credits to reduce your monthly payments and simplify your budget.

professionalLoan.title: Professional Loan
professionalLoan.description: Financing for your walls, business assets, or professional equipment.

renegotiation.title: Rate Renegotiation

support.title: Support
support.description: A dedicated advisor follows you from simulation to signature at the notary.

About.title: About Us
About.subtitle: Your trusted partner in credit and insurance for over 20 years.

Mission.title: Our Mission
Mission.p1: For over 20 years, <highlight>AGM INVEST</highlight> has been supporting individuals in achieving their real estate projects. Our team of experts guides you through every step to obtain the best financing.
Mission.p2: We negotiate for you with our banking partners and guarantee personalized support, from simulation to signature at the notary.

Values.title: Our Values
Values.v1: Total transparency on rates and fees
Values.v3: Responsiveness and availability of our advisors
Values.v4: Recognized expertise in the real estate market

Process.title: Your financing in 4 steps
Process.subtitle: A clear and transparent process to realize your project with peace of mind.

s1.title: 1. Feasibility study
s1.description: Free analysis of your file and definition of your financing budget.

s2.title: 2. Research & Negotiation
s2.description: We consult our partners to obtain the best market conditions.

s3.title: 3. Loan approval
s3.description: Presentation of offers and selection of the best banking proposal.

s4.title: 4. Signature
s4.description: Support up to the signatures of the offer and the notarized deed.

WhyChooseUs.title: Why choose <highlight>AGM INVEST</highlight>?

time.title: Time Saving

History.title: Our History
History.subtitle: Nearly 20 years of expertise and innovation at the service of your projects.

m2006.title: Creation of AGM Invest
m2006.description: Foundation of the firm in Nantes with a vision: simplify access to credit for individuals.

m2012.title: Regional Expansion
m2012.description: Opening of 3 new branches in the Grand Ouest and recruitment of 10 experts.

m2018.title: Professional Pole
m2018.description: Launching the offer dedicated to businesses and real estate developers.

m2024.title: 100% Digitalization
m2024.description: Implementation of our online platform allowing real-time file tracking.

Mentions.title: Legal Notice
Mentions.subtitle: Legal and regulatory information regarding AGM INVEST.

Values.name: AGM INVEST
Values.form: SARL with a capital of â‚¬7,622
Values.headquarters: MELPARK â€“ 40 rue Jean Monnet, 68200 Mulhouse - France

Section2.title: Activities & Expertise
Section2.p1: AGM INVEST is a French company specializing in financial consulting, loan brokerage, and strategic support for individuals and professionals. With over 50 years of cumulative experience in financial services, AGM INVEST provides its expertise independently for wealth, real estate, and financial projects.

list.li3: Intermediation in banking operations and payment services
list.li4: Support in financial negotiation and structuring
list.li5: Consulting and marketing of real estate projects
list.li6: Analysis and optimization of financing solutions

Section3.title: Compliance & Regulation
Section3.p1: AGM INVEST is registered with ORIAS under number 14001635 as:

list.li1: Representative of an Intermediary in Banking Operations and Payment Services
list.li2: Broker in Banking Operations and Payment Services

Section3.p2: The activity of Intermediary in Banking Operations and Payment Services (IOBSP) is governed by the French Monetary and Financial Code. AGM INVEST is subject to the control of the Prudential Supervision and Resolution Authority (ACPR), 4 Place de Budapest CS 92459, 75436 Paris Cedex 09.

Service.title: Customer Service
Service.text: For any questions or complaints, you can contact us by email:

Footer.copyright: Â© 1993 â€“ 2026 AGM INVEST â€“ All rights reserved
Footer.desc: Financial consulting company â€“ Operations without handling of funds
Footer.disclaimer: The information on this site does not constitute a contractual offer.

Privacy.title: Privacy Policy
Privacy.subtitle: AGM INVEST commitment to the protection of your personal data and respect for your privacy (GDPR).
Privacy.intro: At AGM INVEST, we place capital importance on the confidentiality and security of your information. This policy details how we collect, use, and protect your data within our financial consulting and brokerage activities.

Section1.title: 1. Collected Data
Section1.description: To process your financing requests and provide our services, we collect the following information:

list.li1: <bold>Identity:</bold> Last name, first name, date of birth, nationality, identity documents.
list.li2: <bold>Contact details:</bold> Postal address, email, phone number.
list.li3: <bold>Family Situation:</bold> Marital status, number of dependent children.
list.li4: <bold>Professional Situation:</bold> Employer, contract type, seniority, income.
list.li5: <bold>Financial Situation:</bold> Bank statements, tax notices, current loans, assets.
list.li6: <bold>Connection Data:</bold> IP address, connection logs (for security).

Section2.title: 2. Purposes of Processing
Section2.description: Your data is processed for determined, explicit, and legitimate purposes:

c1.title: Solvency study
c1.desc: Analysis of your repayment capacity for credit granting.

c2.title: File management
c2.desc: Administrative follow-up, contract constitution, and customer relationship management.

c4.title: Security
c4.desc: Fraud protection and securing your online access.

Section3.title: 3. Sharing and Recipients
Section3.p1: Your data is strictly confidential. It is only transmitted to authorized recipients when necessary:

list.li1: Our banking and insurance partners (for the study and validation of your financing).
list.li2: Public bodies and regulators (on legal requisition).
list.li3: Our secure technical service providers (hosting, electronic signature).

Section3.p2: AGM INVEST will never sell your personal data to third parties for commercial purposes.

Section4.title: 4. Your Rights
Section4.p1: In accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), you have the following rights:

list.li1: Right of access to your data
list.li3: Right to erasure ("right to be forgotten")

Section4.contact: To exercise these rights, contact our Data Protection Officer (DPO):
Section4.postal: or by postal mail to the registered office.

Cookies.title: Cookie Management
Cookies.subtitle: Understand how and why we use cookies to improve your experience on AGM INVEST.
Cookies.intro: A cookie is a small text file placed on your terminal (computer, tablet, smartphone) when visiting our site. It allows AGM INVEST to remember your actions and preferences over a given period.

Essential.title: Essential Cookies
Essential.desc: Indispensable for the proper functioning of the site. They allow you to navigate, access your secure area, and ensure transaction security. They cannot be deactivated.

Functional.title: Functional Cookies
Functional.desc: Allow remembering your choices (language, username) to offer you a personalized and smoother experience.

Analytics.title: Analytical Cookies
Analytics.desc: Help us understand how visitors interact with the site (pages visited, time spent) in order to improve our services. Anonymized data.

Section2.title: 2. Manage your preferences
Section2.intro: You can modify your cookie preferences at any time via your web browser settings.
Section2.note: Note: Refusing essential cookies may prevent access to certain critical features like logging into your customer account.

CGU.title: General Terms of Use
CGU.subtitle: Terms of use of the services offered by AGM INVEST via its online platform.

Section1.title: 1. Purpose
Section1.content: These General Terms of Use (GTU) define the conditions of access and use of the services offered by AGM INVEST via its online platform.

Section2.title: 2. Access to Service
Section2.p1: Access to the platform is reserved for users with a validated account.
Section2.p2: AGM INVEST reserves the right to refuse or suspend an account in case of non-compliance with these terms.

Section3.title: 3. Nature of Services

list.li2: Assistance related to the acquisition of vehicles

Section3.warning: AGM INVEST is not a bank or a credit institution, but a regulated financial intermediary.

Section4.title: 4. Verification Process
Section4.content: Full access to services requires a multi-step verification procedure defined by AGM INVEST.

Section5.title: 5. Payments
Section5.p1: Some services may require the payment of security deposits.
Section5.p2: These amounts are clearly communicated to the client before any validation.

Section6.title: 6. Liability
Section6.content: AGM INVEST acts as an administrative intermediary and does not guarantee the acceptance of a file by third parties (administrations, partners, service providers).

Section7.title: 7. Personal Data
Section7.content: Data is processed in accordance with current regulations. See our

Section8.title: 8. Termination
Section8.content: AGM INVEST reserves the right to suspend an account in case of fraud, false declaration, or abusive use of the service.

Section9.title: 9. Applicable Law
Section9.p1: These GTU are subject to French law.
Section9.p2: Any dispute falls under the jurisdiction of French courts.

Footer.copyright: Â© 2026 AGM INVEST - All rights reserved

Refund.title: Refund Terms
Refund.subtitle: Modalities for the restitution of the AGM INVEST fixed security deposit.

Section1.title: 1. Fixed Security Deposit
Section1.p1: This deposit is not a fee. It must come from the same bank account (RIB) as the one provided during your request.
Section1.p2: It is fully refunded at the same time as the credit transfer.

Section2.title: 2. Restitution
Section2.content: The restitution of the security deposit occurs in accordance with the conditions provided in the contract signed between AGM INVEST and the client.

Section3.title: 3. Cases of Non-Restitution
Section3.intro: The security deposit may not be refunded in case of:

list.li1: Voluntary abandonment of the file by the client

Section4.title: 4. Deadlines
Section4.content: Refund deadlines are indicated in the contract and may vary according to the nature of the file and the partners involved.

Section5.title: 5. Disputes
Section5.content: In case of dispute, French law applies.

Footer.copyright: Â© 2026 AGM INVEST - All rights reserved

Trust.title: Trust & Security
Trust.subtitle: At AGM INVEST, the security of client files is an absolute priority.
Trust.intro: We implement rigorous and transparent processes to guarantee the security and confidentiality of your information.

admin.title: Administrative Verification
admin.desc: Each file is meticulously verified by our administrative team.

multi.title: Multi-Step Validation
multi.desc: Multi-step verification process to guarantee compliance.

contract.title: Clear Contractual Framework
contract.desc: All our services are framed by transparent and detailed contracts.

trace.title: Payment Traceability
trace.desc: All payments are traced and secured via certified systems.

data.title: Data Protection
data.desc: GDPR compliance and encryption of all your personal data.

support.title: Dedicated Customer Support
support.desc: A team at your service to answer all your questions.

individual.title: Individual Processing
individual.content: Each file is processed individually by our team. We take the time to analyze your specific situation to offer you personalized support.

promise.title: Our Commitment
promise.content: AGM INVEST is committed to transparency in its processes and communications. Your trust is our priority.

Footer.copyright: Â© 2026 AGM INVEST - All rights reserved

Disclaimer.title: Financial Disclaimer
Disclaimer.subtitle: Important information on the nature of AGM INVEST services.

warning.title: Important Warning
warning.content: AGM INVEST is neither a bank nor a credit institution, but a regulated financial intermediary.

nature.title: Nature of Activity
nature.p1: AGM INVEST acts exclusively as an administrative and matching intermediary.
nature.p2: Our services consist of support in your administrative procedures and matching with qualified partners.

list.li1: AGM INVEST does not guarantee the acceptance of a file by third parties
list.li2: AGM INVEST does not guarantee the effective obtaining of financing
list.li3: The deadlines, amounts, and final decisions depend on external partners and the organizations involved

indicative.title: Indicative Information
indicative.content: All information provided by AGM INVEST is provided for information purposes only and does not constitute a contractual commitment to results.

nature.title: Nature of Services
nature.p1: The services offered by AGM INVEST involve administrative support and matching.
nature.p2: We act as an intermediary to facilitate your procedures and put you in contact with qualified partners.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Files
acceptance.content: The acceptance of files depends on external partners. AGM INVEST cannot guarantee the systematic acceptance of your request.

results.title: Variable Results
results.content: Results may vary according to the client's situation, high pressure criteria, and market conditions.

Reviews.title: What our clients <highlight>say about us</highlight>
Reviews.description: Discover testimonies from those who trusted us with their financing project.

r1.comment: Impeccable service! I got my financing in less than 2 weeks. The team is extremely professional.

r2.comment: Excellent experience. The advisor guided me through every step. I highly recommend AGM INVEST.

Support.title: Support Center
Support.subtitle: We are here to answer your questions and support you.

FAQs.a: Verification is done entirely online. Simply upload a valid ID and perform a quick video selfie to confirm your identity in seconds.

FAQs.q: What are the loan approval times?
FAQs.a: Once your file is complete, you receive an immediate response in principle. Final analysis and fund disbursement usually occur within 24 to 48 business hours.

FAQs.q: Can I modify my request after submission?
FAQs.a: As long as your request is in 'Pending' status, you can contact our support to make changes. Once validated, modifications are no longer possible.

FAQs.q: How do I download my signed contract?
FAQs.a: Your contract is available in the 'My Documents' section of your dashboard as soon as the electronic signature is confirmed.
You must be of legal age, reside in an eligible country, and prove stable income. Each project is studied personally by our experts.

FAQs.q: How do I secure my account?
FAQs.a: We recommend activating two-factor authentication (2FA) in your settings and using a unique, complex password.
